channel.title: History Help please
channel.description:
ok here are the questions, if u know a lot about Muslims, Arabs, and Religion these are for you
1.What beliefs and religious texts are common to Judaism,Christianty, and Islam?In what wats is Islam diffrent from these religions?
2.What is the Qur'an?What is the Sunnah?Why are they important to Muslims?
3.Describe each of the five pillars of faith. How do they Influence the daily lives of Muslims?
